visibility_menu_scan_description_1: The Scan tab controls what information is visible when someone scans the pet's profile using a QR code or similar methods.
visibility_menu_scan_description_2: Similar to the Share tab, you can adjust visibility settings for contacts, medical information, and other details, but specifically for those who scan the profile. This allows for greater control over what details are accessible in different viewing contexts.
visibility_menu_share_description_1: The Share tab manages the visibility of information for people who access the pet's profile via a shared link. When you share a pet’s profile, you can decide what information will be visible to the recipient by toggling the settings on this tab.
visibility_menu_share_description_2: Information such as contacts, medical details, pictures, and documents can be selectively hidden from viewers who access the profile through the shared link, ensuring that only the necessary details are shared.
visibility_menu_description: The Visibility Menu allows users to control what information is visible to others when sharing a pet's profile through the app. The menu is divided into two main tabs: Share and Scan, each affecting different methods of accessing the pet's profile.
addTagTutorial_Step1_subtitle: You’ll find your unique 12-symbol activation code on the card included with your product, as shown in the illustration above.
addTagTutorial_Step2_subtitle: In the text field at the top of this page, carefully enter the 16-symbol activation code exactly as it appears on your card.
addTagTutorial_Step3_subtitle: After entering the activation code, click the or "Add Tag" button to proceed.
addTagTutorial_Step4_subtitle: Once the process is complete, your dog tag will be successfully linked to your account.
tutorial_Description_Create_Pet: To create a new pet, go to the Home Screen and scroll down to the bottom until you see the "Create New Pet" button. Tap it, and a dialog will open. Enter your pet’s name, and you’re all set—your new pet is ready to go!
tutorial_Description_Tags_Pet: Go to the Pet’s Profile Page and click on the 'Tags' section. Here, you can manage existing tags and add new ones.
tutorial_Description_Tags_Account: Navigate to the Settings Page and select the Tags section. From there, you can manage and add new account tags.
tutorial_Description_Pet_Contacts: Visit the Pet’s Profile Page and click on the Contacts section. You can manage and add new contact information for your pet. When adding a new contact, you can choose to either create a new contact or select an existing one that you’ve used with other pets.
tutorial_Description_Pet_Privacy: In the Pet’s Profile, go to the Privacy tab. You can choose which sections should be visible to people who scan the tag or those with whom the pet is shared.
tutorial_Description_Pet_Lost: In the Pet’s Profile, locate the Lost menu. Here, you can mark the pet as lost and add important details that will be displayed to people who scan the tag. They will see that the pet is lost and the added information.
tutorial_Description_Notifications: In the Settings page, find the Notifications section. Here, you can toggle which notifications you want to receive and deactivate any you prefer not to get.
scansPage_description_1: Below, you’ll find all the times someone has opened the link on your pet’s tag. The location data shown is based on the IP address of the device used, so please note that the location might not be perfectly accurate as it can be altered or faked.
scansPage_description_2: Even if someone finds your pet and chooses not to contact you or share their exact location, this information can still be a valuable clue in helping you locate your beloved companion. Every bit of data counts in the search to bring your pet home!
scansPage_description_3: Please note that the link you share with others when you provide your pet’s information is different from the one on the tag. These scans are only from the tag link and are not affected by anyone you’ve shared your pet’s details with.
